name: OneBanc Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: OneBanc, a neo bank start-up, is an artificial intelligence-enabled harmonizer that personalizes employee banking, benefits, and expenses. The idea of OneBanc started when a young girl asked Vibhore, a serial entrepreneur, why the money in her piggybank never grew. Adopting this as the philosophy of #DemandMore, OneBanc connects enterprises, banks, and HR Tech platforms to enhance value for all stakeholders.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Personalised Experiential Banking!
ShortDescription: OneBanc is a neobank, building the economic infrastructure for the workforce of India

Highlights.name: Strengthen Your Trust
Highlights.description: We prioritize compliance and conduct regular audits without any compromise.

Highlights.name: Certifications & Compliance
Highlights.description: We employ industry's best practices, ensuring security and privacy compliance.

Highlights.name: Maintain Your Privacy
Highlights.description: We respect your preferences concerning the collection and use of your personal information.

enhanced_description: OneBanc is a neobank and an artificial intelligence-enabled harmonizer specifically designed to personalize employee banking, benefits, and expenses for the workforce in India. Adopting the philosophy of #DemandMore, OneBanc aims to build the economic infrastructure for employees by connecting enterprises, banks, and HR Tech platforms to enhance value for all stakeholders. The platform focuses on providing financial wellness, personalized banking experiences, and maximum security, ensuring compliance through regular audits, industry best practices, and stringent privacy controls.
key_use_cases: Supporting diversity and inclusion initiatives through accessible financial infrastructure
competitive_advantages: AI-enabled personalization of employee banking, benefits, and expenses
Ecosystem connectivity linking enterprises, banks, and HR Tech platforms
Strong emphasis on maximum security, compliance, and privacy
Focus on financial wellness for the workforce
roi_benefits: Enhanced employee financial wellness and satisfaction
Improved personalization of employee financial services and benefits
Contribution to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce
Risk reduction through enhanced security, compliance, and privacy measures
compliance_features: Prioritizes compliance and conducts regular audits
Employs industry best practices for security and privacy compliance
Respects user preferences concerning the collection and use of personal information
security_features: Industry best practices for security compliance
